review: "Usagi Yojimbo Fantagraphics Collection n°01/02 is a fantastic compilation of classic stories, beautifully showcasing Stan Sakai's mastery in blending historical Japanese culture with anthropomorphic characters. The detailed artwork and well-crafted narratives make this a must-read for fans of the genre, as well as anyone interested in high-quality comics. A worthy addition to any comic enthusiast's collection!"
